refnamediv.refpurpose: rearranges the fft output, moving the zero frequency to the center of the spectrum

listitem.para: real or complex vector or matrix.
real or complex vector or matrix.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: if x results of an fft computation y= fftshift(x) or y= fftshift(x,"all") moves the zero frequency component to the center of the spectrum, which is sometimes a more convenient form.
If x is a vector of size n, y is the vector x([n/2+1:n,1:n/2])
If x is an m by n matrix y is the matrix x([m/2+1:n,1:m/2],[n/2+1:n,1:n/2]).
y= fftshift(x,n) make the swap only along the nth dimension
